panels.description: Número total de requests no ultimo min
panels.title: Total request

panels.description: Duração media de request no ultimo min

targets.expr: rate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-loja-mkt", status="200", uri="/topicos"}[1m]) / rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-loja-mkt", status="200", uri="/topicos"}[1m])

rate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-loja-mkt", status="200", uri="/topicos/{id}"}[1m]) / rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-loja-mkt", status="200", uri="/topicos/{id}"}[1m])

rate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-loja-mkt", status="200", uri="/auth"}[1m]) / rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-loja-mkt", status="200", uri="/auth"}[1m])

panels.title: Avarege duration request

panels.description: Taxa de error nos últimos 5 min

targets.expr: sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-loja-mkt", uri != "/actuator/prometheus", status="500" }[5m])) / sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-loja-mkt", uri != "/actuator/prometheus"}[5m]))

sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-loja-mkt", uri != "/actuator/prometheus", status="400" }[5m])) / sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-loja-mkt", uri != "/actuator/prometheus"}[5m]))

sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-loja-mkt", uri != "/actuator/prometheus", status="404" }[5m])) / sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-loja-mkt", uri != "/actuator/prometheus"}[5m]))

panels.title: Error rate

panels.description: Número de requests por endepoint no ultimo min
panels.title: Request count

panels.description: Tempo de resposta no ultimo min

targets.expr: rate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-loja-mkt", uri != "/actuator/prometheus"}[1m]) / rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-loja-mkt", uri != "/actuator/prometheus"}[1m])

panels.title: Response time
